channel.title: How to change the characters starter items?
channel.description:
Hey i was just wondering if someone could tell me how to change the items a new character starts with?
Thanks _.-RioT-._

item.title: How to change the characters starter items?
item.dc:creator: @X-X_G_X-X X-X--G--X-X
item.description:
@X-X_G_X-X wrote:

look for that code, and modifly it how you like.

if(starter == 0){
starter = 1;
sM(“note if you flame you get muted.”);
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
addItem(1321, 1);
addItem(1189, 1);
addItem(556, 250);
addItem(557, 250);
addItem(558, 250);
addItem(555, 250);
addItem(554, 250);
addItem(562, 250);
addItem(841, 1);
addItem(882, 500);
addItem(995, 5000000);

}

Read full topic
item.source: How to change the characters starter items?
